Carrying on with your 
education
Becoming a mother certainly 
does not have to mean the 
end of your education. If you 
are still of compulsory school 
age, your school should not 
exclude you on grounds of 
pregnancy or health and 
safety issues connected with 
your pregnancy. 
However, they may talk to 
you about making alternative 
arrangements for your 
education. You will be allowed 
up to 16 calendar weeks off 
school before and after the 
birth.
